about_the_game:
"ShowMeSpeed" is crafted in the fiery forges of 2D platforming hell, this game is not just difficult—it's diabolical. Each level is designed not just to challenge you, but to taunt you and make you hate it. If you thought you knew frustration, think again.

This is not a game that coddles its players;
it's a game that throws them into the deep end of despair and challenges them to swim.

Features:
Extreme Difficulty: Every stage is designed to push you to your limits and beyond.
Unforgiving Mechanics: Perfect timing, precise controls, and a keen understanding of the game's physics are required to survive.
2D Style: Classic Arcade art enhances the brutal challenge with its straightforward yet visually appealing aesthetic.

This is not a game that coddles its players;

name: ShowMeSpeed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD Phenom II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 570 / Radeon HD 6970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: intel core i7-4000 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / Radeon RX 5700 dx11+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: "This game hates you, and rest assured, you will hate it too! 'ShowMeSpeed' is a merciless 2D challenge designed for the few who dare to conquer it. There are very few spots among the best of the best—and you're probably not one of them."
